description: This file defines a Flutter widget named TransactionList that displays a list of financial transactions. It handles empty states and custom styling for expense and income entries.

classes.name: TransactionList
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a list of transactions with customizable tap handling and styling based on transaction type.

methods.name: TransactionList
methods.description: Constructor for TransactionList, requiring a list of transactions and optionally an onTap callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, showing either a message when list is empty or a list of transaction items.
